snippet: European Union states agreed on Monday to open a small command center to run military training missions abroad, a step France and Italy hope is a precursor to an EU defense headquarters....

headline.main: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule
headline.print_headline: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule

lead_paragraph: European Union states agreed on Monday to open a small command center to run military training missions abroad, a step France and Italy hope is a precursor to an EU defense headquarters.
